ISSUE.TITLE: CI: e2e: pull/run and decrypt from local registry: timeout
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Placeholder for a flake I've been seeing in e2e. So far, only rootless, but that might be happenstance. ``` â€¢ [FAILED] [94.159 seconds] Podman pull podman pull and decrypt <------ sometimes "run and decrypt" [It] From local registry $ podman [options] push -q --compression-format=zstd --encryption-key jwe:/tmp/CI_vNKl/podman-e2e-2638702892/subtest-158022943/key,withcomma.rsa.pub --tls-verify=false --remove-signatures quay.io/libpod/alpine:latest localhost:5012/my-alpine-pull-and-decrypt $ podman [options] rmi quay.io/libpod/alpine:latest Untagged: quay.io/libpod/alpine:latest Deleted: 961769676411f082461f9ef46626dd7a2d1e2b2a38e6a44364bcbecf51e66dd4 $ podman [options] pull --tls-verify=false localhost:5012/my-alpine-pull-and-decrypt Trying to pull localhost:5012/my-alpine-pull-and-decrypt:latest... Getting image source signatures Copying blob sha256:3e9bdc83b3abf695cc03140088561898566a98d3895d11dd5e5ba6c54031c6d0 SIGABRT: abort ... [FAILED] Timed out after 90.001s. ``` * debian-13 : int podman debian-13 rootless host sqlite * PR #24110 * [10-01 08:26](https://api.cirrus-ci.com/v1/artifact/task/4731544428871680/html/int-podman-debian-13-rootless-host-sqlite.log.html#t--Podman-pull-podman-pull-and-decrypt-From-local-registry--1) in Podman pull podman pull and decrypt From local registry * PR #23814 * [08-30-2024 10:06](https://api.cirrus-ci.com/v1/artifact/task/5426360372428800/html/int-podman-debian-13-rootless-host-sqlite.log.html#t--Podman-run-podman-run-and-decrypt-from-local-registry--1) in Podman run podman run and decrypt from local registry * fedora-40 : int podman fedora-40 rootless host sqlite * PR #23985 * [09-17 12:06](https://api.cirrus-ci.com/v1/artifact/task/5682818120941568/html/int-podman-fedora-40-rootless-host-sqlite.log.html#t--Podman-run-podman-run-and-decrypt-from-local-registry--1) in Podman run podman run and decrypt from local registry * rawhide : int podman rawhide rootless host sqlite * PR #24128 * [10-01 18:34](https://api.cirrus-ci.com/v1/artifact/task/4932238159118336/html/int-podman-rawhide-rootless-host-sqlite.log.html#t--Podman-run-podman-run-and-decrypt-from-local-registry--1) in Podman run podman run and decrypt from local registry * PR #24124 * [10-04 09:39](https://api.cirrus-ci.com/v1/artifact/task/6420526938193920/html/int-podman-rawhide-rootless-host-sqlite.log.html#t--Podman-pull-podman-pull-and-decrypt-From-local-registry--1) in Podman pull podman pull and decrypt From local registry | x | x | x | x | x | x | | ---: | ---: | ---: | ---: | ---: | ---: | | int(5) | podman(5) | rawhide(2) | rootless(5) | host(5) | sqlite(5) | | | | debian-13(2) | | | | | | | fedora-40(1) | | | |

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #24221 from edsantiago/fix-sizerootfs-flake CI: quadlet system tests: use airgapped testimage

COMMIT.MESSAGE: test/e2e: try debug potential pasta issue Run pasta with --trace and a log file to see if the hangs are caused by pasta not correctly closing connections as assumed in #24219. As the log is super verbose do not log it by default so I added some extra logic to make sure it is only logged when the test fails. Signed-off-by: Paul Holzinger <pholzing@redhat.com>
